section.title: Software Used
section.p: The XML-Security-C package makes heavy use of the Xalan-C and Xerces-C++ libraries from the Apache Software Foundation XML Project.
This documentation has been created using Forrest, also part of the Apache Sofware Foundation's XML project.
The package also makes heavy use of the OpenSSL cryptographic libraries to provide the cryptographic foundation. The associated license can be found in the distribution in the doc/ directory.
